name: OurHillOfStars
description:
Our Hill of Stars

It's harvest season and Harvey awaits a lot of yield this year.

You need to guide him over each field and find the path with the least amount of turns.

Can you solve each level with 3 stars? Challenge yourself!

Maybe there is a better solution than we (the developers) anticipated? ;)

How to play
  • left click on tile
    • without arrow: place arrow
    • with arrow: rotate arrow
  • right click on tile removes arrow
  • click on play button to start the run
  • click on restart button to restart the game
  • click on reset button to clear all arrows
  • click on pause game button to pause and go back to level overview
  • press p for pause (and go back to level overview)
